tool_description:
Extract data from online news & articles. Get full metadata with content, images, authors, summary, category, keywords, topics, and more.

Automatic data extraction from articles, products, discussions, and more. This API uses advanced AI technology to retrieve clean, structured data without the need for manual rules or site-specific training.
name: MagicAPI Article Extraction
title: MagicAPI Article Extraction

api_list.name: extract
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://magicapi-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "magicapi-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://magicapi-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "magicapi-article-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
